name: The Black Forest Daemon
description:
A Daemon stalks this forest, the forest is his domain. Do you dare enter?

Light the bonfires to build your magic and the draw the daemon into your banishment circle to rid the forest of him for good. You are the last hope for the remaining people of the Black Forest. Fortunately  you can keep this daemon at bay with the magical flames of your torches. But be careful because torches can only burn for so long.

Controls:

wasd - move

spacebar - show/hide your torch

left click - pick up torches

We have a devlog about the making of this game: https://youtu.be/Oh1f7W4rTgo
